data.title: SLA Industries 2nd Edition Kickstarter
data.meta_description: SLA Industries 2nd Edition had a very succesful Kickstarter and is now in production. If you missed the Kickstarter campaign but still wish to partake, late pledges are available on CrowdOx. The top-tier “Head Office” pledge is all gone, but there are still a few “Slayer’s Lounge” pledges left. Follow us on Twitter and Facebook using […]
data.text:
SLA Industries 2nd Edition had a very succesful Kickstarter and is now in production.

If you missed the Kickstarter campaign but still wish to partake, late pledges are available on CrowdOx. The top-tier “Head Office” pledge is all gone, but there are still a few “Slayer’s Lounge” pledges left.

Follow us on Twitter and Facebook using the links below.

Subscribe to the Nightfall Games mailing list:

[mc4wp_form id=”798″]
